subtask_1_output.label: A
subtask_1_output.title: Slow evaporation of tap water
subtask_1_output.summary: Tap water (~1-2 L) placed in shallow pans and left to slowly evaporate at room temperature to begin enriching the 17O content.

subtask_1_output.label: B
subtask_1_output.title: Microwave boiling to sterilize enriched water
subtask_1_output.summary: Briefly boiled collected water in a microwave to kill any bacteria before storage.

subtask_1_output.label: C
subtask_1_output.title: Filtration of partially enriched water
subtask_1_output.summary: Passed the enriched water through fluted filter paper to remove particulates.

subtask_1_output.label: D
subtask_1_output.title: Fractional distillation
subtask_1_output.summary: Distilled enriched water through a packed column and collected multiple fractions at distinct boiling points.

subtask_1_output.label: E
subtask_1_output.title: Electrolysis of 17O-labeled water
subtask_1_output.summary: Applied a constant voltage (5 V) to 17O-enriched water using copper and graphite electrodes to generate hydrogen peroxide.

subtask_1_output.label: F
subtask_1_output.title: Colorimetric assays for hydrogen peroxide
subtask_1_output.summary: Quantified the 17O-labeled hydrogen peroxide produced from electrolysis via two redox-based colorimetric methods.

subtask_1_output.label: G
subtask_1_output.title: Measurement of water density
subtask_1_output.summary: Determined the density of the fractionally distilled 17O-enriched water using a calibrated pipette and balance at 21 oC.

subtask_1_output.label: H
subtask_1_output.title: Measurement of water refractive index
subtask_1_output.summary: Used an Abbe refractometer at 24.5 oC to measure the refractive index of the enriched water sample.

subtask_1_output.label: I
subtask_1_output.title: 17O NMR measurement of water
subtask_1_output.summary: Collected proton-decoupled 17O NMR spectra of H2 17O at various pH values to observe changes in chemical shift.

subtask_1_output.label: J
subtask_1_output.title: Synthesis of 17O-labeled sodium hydroxide
subtask_1_output.summary: Reacted a small piece of sodium metal with 17O-enriched water to form Na17OH for subsequent organic synthesis.

subtask_1_output.label: K
subtask_1_output.title: Synthesis of 17O-labeled 1-hexanol
subtask_1_output.summary: Performed an SN2 reaction by adding 1-iodohexane to the freshly prepared Na17OH solution, yielding 17O-1-hexanol.

subtask_1_output.label: L
subtask_1_output.title: Preparation of 17O-labeled TMS ether of 1-hexanol
subtask_1_output.summary: Reacted 17O-1-hexanol with bis(trimethylsilyl)trifluoroacetamide (BSTFA) to form the trimethylsilyl ether derivative.

subtask_1_output.label: M
subtask_1_output.title: Synthesis of 17O-labeled hexamethyldisiloxane (HMDS)
subtask_1_output.summary: Mixed BSTFA with 17O-enriched water to produce labeled HMDS via hydrolysis and condensation of trimethylsilyl groups.

subtask_1_output.label: N
subtask_1_output.title: Preparation of 17O-labeled camphor
subtask_1_output.summary: Allowed camphor to exchange its ketone oxygen with 17O-enriched water under mild conditions, forming 17O-camphor.

subtask_1_output.label: O
subtask_1_output.title: GC-MS analysis of 17O-labeled 1-hexanol
subtask_1_output.summary: Injected derivatized and underivatized hexanol samples into a Varian ion trap GC-MS to assess isotopic enrichment.

subtask_1_output.label: P
subtask_1_output.title: GC-MS analysis of 17O-labeled TMS ether of 1-hexanol
subtask_1_output.summary: Examined the trimethylsilyl derivative by GC-MS to quantify mass shifts and determine 17O incorporation.

subtask_1_output.label: Q
subtask_1_output.title: GC-MS analysis of 17O-labeled hexamethyldisiloxane
subtask_1_output.summary: Used GC-MS fragment ions (M-CH4) to distinguish 16O, 17O, and 18O isotopologues in HMDS.

subtask_1_output.label: R
subtask_1_output.title: GC-MS analysis of 17O-labeled camphor
subtask_1_output.summary: Confirmed isotopic enrichment and fragmentation differences between labeled and unlabeled camphor samples.

subtask_1_output.label: S
subtask_1_output.title: NMR analyses of 17O-labeled 1-hexanol
subtask_1_output.summary: Characterized product by 1H, 13C, and 17O NMR to confirm structure and isotopic incorporation.

subtask_1_output.label: T
subtask_1_output.title: NMR analyses of 17O-labeled hexamethyldisiloxane
subtask_1_output.summary: Acquired 1H, 13C, and 17O NMR to validate the formation of labeled HMDS from BSTFA hydrolysis.

subtask_1_output.label: U
subtask_1_output.title: NMR analyses of 17O-labeled hydrogen peroxide
subtask_1_output.summary: Used 17O NMR to observe the labeled peroxide peak (~179 ppm) produced by water electrolysis.

subtask_1_output.label: V
subtask_1_output.title: NMR analyses of 17O-labeled camphor
subtask_1_output.summary: Acquired 1H, 13C, and 17O NMR on camphor exchanged with 17O water to confirm labeling.

subtask_1_output.label: W
subtask_1_output.title: Investigation of ethanol OH exchange in presence of 17O-labeled camphor
subtask_1_output.summary: Detected an unexpected reaction wherein water displaced the ethanol OH, observed by 17O NMR.

subtask_1_output.label: X
subtask_1_output.title: Investigation of cyclohexanone-mediated exchange of ethanol OH with 17O-labeled water
subtask_1_output.summary: Demonstrated a similar nucleophilic exchange reaction using cyclohexanone, monitored via 17O NMR.
